prayer.title: 🕊️ Morning Prayer
prayer.modeh_ani: מודה אני לפניך — I gratefully thank You, living and eternal King, for returning my soul within me with compassion — great is Your faithfulness.
prayer.blessing: Blessed are You who clothes the naked — provide for all my needs this day.
prayer.psalm: Psalm 90:17: "May the favor of the Lord our God rest on us; establish the work of our hands."
prayer.proverb: Proverbs 21:5: "The plans of the diligent lead surely to abundance."
prayer.intention: Give me discernment between opportunities and distractions. Not everything good is good for me right now.
prayer.closing: The Lord goes before you today. He will be with you; He will never leave you nor forsake you. Do not be afraid; do not be discouraged.

weather.title: ☀️ Weather — Temecula
weather.summary: Cool overcast morning, high humidity. Clearing to mid-60s by afternoon. Valentine's Day weather — good for an evening out.

mre.title: 📊 MRE Trading
mre.thesis: Fear elevated (36), regime sideways (day 3). No active BUY signals — all 24 assets in HOLD. Breadth is strong (RSP outperforming SPY) which is encouraging, but models diverge: F&G says fear while cycle says mid-bull. Reduce position sizes, focus on range-bound plays until direction clears. Markets closed today (Saturday).
warnings: Models diverge — F&G says fear while cycle says mid_bull

family.title: 💕 Family Focus — Valentine's Day
family.recent_pattern: Recent interactions show mixed signals — positive moments of supportive listening and initiative, but stress around timing, intimacy rejection, and nighttime baby duties creating friction.
family.todays_action: 🔴 VALENTINE'S DAY PRIORITY: This is a critical repair opportunity. Put the phone away entirely after kids sleep. No building tonight. Give Jillian your full, undivided attention. Acknowledge recent stress without defending. Let her lead the evening.
recommendations: Handle bedtime routine solo so she gets time to get ready
Put phone away completely after 8pm — zero exceptions tonight
Acknowledge the hard weeks without fixing or defending
Create space for her to express frustrations without solving
Increase acts of service dramatically — today especially
